rows.label: tev002211_MSG0010
rows.name:
I cannot quite believe it.
Our world, disappearing...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0020
rows.name:
Well, if it is true, it would be irresponsible
to bury our heads in the sand. We must
take measures, the sooner the better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0030
rows.name:
The city is teeming with those who wish
to leave with us, yet we've had virtually
no reports of anti-social behavior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0040
rows.name:
The other races have reached agreement
and worked to maintain order amid the
chaos. ...I really ought to commend them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0050
rows.name:
The success of this plan—indeed, the future of
the human race—depends on you, and only you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0060
rows.name:
Fully explore all avenues of preparation.
Failure is not an option.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0070
rows.name:
What are you still doing here?
Your team's duty is to infiltrate
the enemy stronghold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0080
rows.name:
There is no time to waste.
Return to your mission, immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0090
rows.name:
...So, you're alive? Good.
When I heard that communications
were interrupted, I feared the worst.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0100
rows.name:
You needn't be worried about us.
Concentrate only on your mission of
destroying Void and returning the cores.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002211_MSG0110
rows.name:
And also...ensure that you all come
back to us. I, for one, will be praying
for your safe return.[ST:wait ]
